column2: Dialogue
column3: Greets officer (e.g. good morning Captain Wang, good morning sir)
column4: Doesn’t ask about welfare, (e.g. How are you doing today?)
column5: Uses honorific (e.g. I’m honored to meet you, I’m thrilled to meet you)
